com.snakybo.torch.graphics.mesh

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.asset.Asset
      • com.snakybo.torch.graphics.mesh.Mesh

  • public final class Mesh
extends Asset

    A mesh represents a 3D model the engine can read, it can contain vertices, texCoords, normals, tangents, and indices.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mesh()
      Create a new, empty mesh.

      • addFace

        public final void addFace(int i0,
                          int i1,
                          int i2)

        Add a new face.

        This is a shortcut for calling addIndex(int) 3 times.

        Parameters:
        i0 - The first index.
        i1 - The second index.
        i2 - The third index.
